TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_John_Battle, title = John_Battle, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Battle} }

S.FORM: John Battle sraral hya'ga sisyuw na NBA, wal malaxmisuq qaniy la. kawas tay 1962, ryax sa tay 9 nqu tay 11, John Battle, squliq na p'unro.
